info.author: Thomas Scharrenbach
info.description:
==================
lrdgdal for Python
==================

lrdgdal makes raster data available as Linked Data via GDAL and
rdflib.


Documentation
=============
Have a look at the
`project's documentation on readthedocs.org <http://lrdgdal.readthedocs.org>`_
for documentation, examnples, etc.
